  • Method Details

    • initializingMarket

      public Set<Product> initializingMarket()
      Initialization Market

      Store initialization adds a standard list of products to the store. This method must be called before searching for a product in the store by ID. Else, there will be an error.

      Returns:
      a set of products that are in the Market. If the store already has products, then calling this method again will return the same standard list of products.

    • getProductFromMarketProductListById

      public Product getProductFromMarketProductListById(int idProduct)
      Product search by id

      Simple search for a product by id in a product set listProducts in the market.

      Parameters:
      idProduct - accepts the product id by which it searches for a product in the market
      Returns:
      one product from the store list
      Throws:
      InvalidIdProduct - if the product could not be found
